ValidationRule.description: Ensure Next Step is populated before progressing opportunity from "Identify" to "Qualify" stage and beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISBLANK( TEXT(Next_Step__c) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Qualify"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Propose"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Next Step. Next Step relevant to the Sales stage must be completed before progressing the opportunity.
